content: Alright, I'll help you find one.

content: {A喜欢}Pointy ears, standing tall, always ready to hear your call... I think it must be a lively little one.

content: Light, airy colors.

content: Dignified colors? {A想象}Like the feeling of dusk and night, I see. In that case, the plushie should also be a little more... refined.

content: I handmade all the plushies. I hope it finds its way to the softest and fluffiest corner in your heart.

content: Dignified colors.

content: I'll keep traveling in the Starsea. <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, if you find anything interesting, please remember to share it with me.

content: It'll be the perfect spot for cloud-watching. <style=SizeSmall>And even better, if it could shelter us from the rain.</style>

content: Not too light, not too heavy... neutral colors. {A笑眯眯}Like a free cloud that drifts where it wants. Alright, I got it!

content: Perky, pointy ears.

content: {A喜欢}Maybe I can trade some of my handmade plushies again for some of your wonderful inspiration~! <style=SizeSmall>As long as the plushies don't sneak out to play, baa-mm...</style>

content: Hi, I'm <style=NpcName>Medowlyn</style>. I love designing all kinds of quirky plushies, so I'm out here looking for inspiration.
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-12绵朵_绵朵

content: The shapes of clouds change when they meet other clouds...{短暂停} Baa? A new cloud? {A喜欢}Ah, it's a new friend~

content: Something tasty? That's an interesting answer. I can see the fluffy little wishes in your heart now...

content: Now for the next question, imagine... if you had a little companion by your pillow, what kind of ears would it have?

content: Round ears... {A笑眯眯}I bet they're super soft to squish~! And no matter how much you squish, they'll never get mad—a very gentle companion.

content: Soft, round ears.

content: Then... I'll wait for your squishtastic furniture to be ready. And after that, we can sit together, and slowly turn into two little clouds... just drifting, doing nothing at all.
